column4: Using Hardy and Evolution does not have a spell check dictionary loaded.  What package am I missing?
Still does not show on the list of spell checkers from within Evolution
I dunno then.  I suggest using Thunderbird for email, it's better anyway.
tried than many times and always come back to evo
my whole openoffice is not spell checking all of a sudden
do you *really* need a spell checker?
what kind of question is that....why not ask, do you really "need" a computer?
it's a valid question.  Can you not spell without a spell-checker?
I can compute without a computer.  have you uninstalled your spell checker?
yes, no spell checkers installed here.
doubtful but I would think this is a reasonable request as Stormx2 has also indicated
if you say so.  I don't need one myself.  <shrug>
the answer to my question is.... myspell
